parameters.name: channelName
parameters.description: The name of the channel whose information is retrieved.

nested_items.name: serviceManagedS3
nested_items.description: Used to store channel data in an S3 bucket managed by IoT Analytics. You can't change the choice of S3 storage after the data store is created.

nested_items.name: customerManagedS3
nested_items.description: Used to store channel data in an S3 bucket that you manage. If customer managed storage is selected, the retentionPeriod parameter is ignored. You can't change the choice of S3 storage after the data store is created.

nested_items.name: bucket
nested_items.description: The name of the S3 bucket in which channel data is stored.

nested_items.name: keyPrefix
nested_items.description: (Optional) The prefix used to create the keys of the channel data objects. Each object in an S3 bucket has a key that is its unique identifier in the bucket. Each object in a bucket has exactly one key. The prefix must end with a forward slash (/).

nested_items.name: roleArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the role that grants IoT Analytics permission to interact with your Amazon S3 resources.

nested_items.name: retentionPeriod
nested_items.description: How long, in days, message data is kept for the channel.

nested_items.name: unlimited
nested_items.description: If true, message data is kept indefinitely.

nested_items.name: numberOfDays
nested_items.description: The number of days that message data is kept. The unlimited parameter must be false.

nested_items.name: lastUpdateTime
nested_items.description: When the channel was last updated.

nested_items.name: lastMessageArrivalTime
nested_items.description: The last time when a new message arrived in the channel.

nested_items.name: statistics
nested_items.description: Statistics about the channel. Included if the includeStatistics parameter is set to true in the request.

nested_items.name: estimatedSizeInBytes
nested_items.description: The estimated size of the resource, in bytes.

nested_items.name: estimatedOn
nested_items.description: The time when the estimate of the size of the resource was made.
